desc: A fusion game between Tetris, Space Invaders, Block Breaker and Pong.
Try to shoot as many invaders as possible, destroy the most blocks, survive
the longest and lose the fewest balls before the entire screen is covered in Tetris blocks.
A school project for learning Java GUIs and PostgreSQL. The goal is to build a small
control software for a hotel including guests, rooms, staff and salary.

dedda.github.io.desc: Deddas Github Page. Basically the thing you're looking at right now...
